participant_abstract.sent: Then we checked whether we were within budget, it turned out we were actually under budget.
Finally we checked we were doing well compared to all the marketing criteria we had first set earlier in the day.

participant_actions.sent: Complete the questionnaires and go home :-).

participant_decisions.sent: Since the product is particularly well suited to right handed users, we had to decide whether we would also make left handed products.

participant_problems.sent: Make left handed remote or not.
